code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';var MessengerAPI={getMessage:function getMessage(query){var url="/messenger/".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},postMessage:function postMessage(query){var url="/messenger/send".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},postConversation:function postConversation(query){var url="/messenger/conversation".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);}};export default MessengerAPI;
